entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Gillam
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:28 a.m. CDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.8Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
